    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2294</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The enzyme as a Catalyst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Enzym als Katalysator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'enzyme comme catalyseur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O enzyme como um catalizador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'enzima come catalizzatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ένζυμο ως καταλύτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La enzima como catalizador</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates graphically the process of catalysis and the energy changes involved</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Biochemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzymes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">catalysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die graphisch den Prozeß der 
Katalyse und der Energieänderungen zeigt, bezog mit ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre graphiquement le 
processus de la catalyse et des changements d'énergie a impliqué</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstrasse gràfica o processo
do catalysis e das mudanças da energia envolveu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra graficamente il 
processo della catalisi ed i cambiamenti di energia in questione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει γραφικά τη διαδικασία 
της κατάλυσης και τις ενεργειακές αλλαγές σχετικές</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra gráficamente el 
proceso de la catálisis y de los cambios de la energía implicó</string>
          </description>
